overview: Unarius’ most controversial video work: the banned, pre-Civil War-era yarn The Ballad of Annabelle Lee! Whilst reliving one of her many past life experiences, Uriel becomes the Southern belle, Annabelle Lee. Meanwhile her nice white boy assistant gets demoted to her black mammy and is forced to wear black face and drag. Racial strife ensues on the riverboat, The Robert E. Lee, resulting in the tragic demise of all concerned. Of course, dems gots plenty mo’ lives t’ live. The ultimate in New Age logic, complete with blackface.
title: The Ballad Of Annabel Lee
